description:
At Goodrich & Geist, P.C., we remain committed to protecting the rights of injured parties in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Our goal is to help people level the playing field when they go up against big corporations and insurance companies that want to get out of paying for the injuries they caused. Too often, these companies abuse their authority and resources to intimidate people into dropping lawsuits or accepting lowball offers.

Our law firm has experience tackling several different types of personal injury cases. These are some of the most common types we work on:

  • Traffic accidents: Whether you are struck by a truck or a passenger vehicle, our lawyers are ready to help you get compensation for your injuries.
  • Medical malpractice: The law is sometimes hesitant to hold doctors and other health care professionals accountable for medical errors; we can help.
  • Construction accidents: Construction is a dangerous field to work in, even more so when employers do everything they can to dodge accountability.
  • Wrongful death: If negligence led to the death of your loved one, rely on our law firm to help you uncover the clues and present a case to protect the family he or she left behind.
We offer free consultations at our law firm, to make it easy for you to determine if your case is strong enough to pursue. When you choose Goodrich & Geist, P.C., you also choose trustworthiness, professionalism and dedication.
